name: The Citrics
description:
History

The lemon and the orange are getting married!

YEAHHHHHH Congratulations!!!!

Oh no! The families hate each other! THEY ARE FIGHTING!!!!! NOOOOOOOOO

And the worst thing of all, in the middle of the dispute the little strawberry has lost the wedding rings!

This is the story of a little strawberry and her fight for recovering the wedding rings.

Developers
  • Felipe Bermejo
  • Josep Pons
Graphic artist
  • Josep Pons
Game designer
  • Josep Pons
Special thanks
  • Calle
Music
  • Tchaikovsky Piano Concerto no. 1 (Bb Minor)
  • Weeding March, from A Midsummer Night's Dream - Felix Mendelssohn
  • Swam Lake - Chaikovski
Sounds
  • City noise fuente patio - dobroide (freesound.org)
  • Step/Tap - JustInvoke (freesound.org)
  • Metal Clank - f4ngry (freesound.org)
  • Getting hit hugh - dersuperanton (freesound.org)
  • Retro Video Game Coin Pickup - SRJA_Gaming (freesound.org)
